      • getById

        public Grade getById​(String id)
              throws DataNotFoundException,
                     UnauthorizedException
        Get a Grade based on its Id. Only returns Grades the active User is authenticated to see.
        Parameters:
        id - Id to search for
        Returns:
        found Grade with matching Id, null if none is found
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - if entity not found in database
        UnauthorizedException - if user not authorized to access
